job.title: CNC / LTCC Technician (2nd/3rd shift) - Temp-to-Hire
job.description: If you are a CNC Operator LTCC Technician or have experience with screen printing punching tape or electrical testing please read onbrbrWorking here gives you the opportunity to work with cutting edge technology have a direct influence on next generation products hitting the market and drive the overall growth and development of the semiconductor industry We are a fastpaced agile growing company that values diversity of thought and constantly strives for a more diverse inclusive environment We are looking for enthusiastic talented individuals who can thrive in a changing and challenging environmentbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrThe Low Temperature Cofired Ceramic LTCC technology can be defined as a way to produce multilayer circuits with the help of single tapes which are used to apply conductive dielectric andor resistive pastes on These single sheets have to be laminated together and fired in one step allbrulli Inspection of LTCC punched and printed sheetslili Determine the final product requirements based on job specifications including appearance and measurementlili Ensure that all of the quality check procedures put in place by the company are followed during every production phaselili Ability to commit to flexible schedule and prompt arrival for shiftsbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli High school diplomaGED requiredlili 3 years experience in LTCC or similar training punching tape screen printing electrical testing microscope inspection and automatic inspection machineslili Hands on experience inspecting LTCC punched and printed sheets is a pluslili Experience on puncher machine fill printer laminator andor Microcraft Testerlili Familiar with metrology tools such as Mitutoyo or Sigmatechlili Experience using Microsoft Excellili PCB fabrication and testing experience would be a pluslili Strong verbal and written communication such as to inform supervisors of any part or equipment defects to ensure prompt response to the problemlili Team player with strong attention to detailbrliulWILL PROVIDE TRAININGbrbrMust be willing to work weekends Shifts availablebrbr2nd Shift  2pm1030pmbrbr3rd Shift 10pm  630ambrbrWhats In It for YoubrbrHourly Rate 25  30hour depending on experiencebrbrTemptoHire position possibility of fulltime conversion after 6 monthsbrbrMedical Dental Vision and 401k benefits availablebrbrCOVID19 We are committed to the safety of our employees We have ample safety protocols in place including social distancing safety training and appropriate screenings for all onsite personnel and visitorsbrbrbrbrIf you feel you are a good fit for this position please apply here or email your resume to meghanmedrickcybercoderscombrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrMeghanMedrickCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  MM121627888  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulMeghan Medrick  Lead Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hirebrbrCyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ban the Box Ordinance
